home.faqSubtitle: Quick answers to the most common questions we receive from Albanian EV shoppers.

faqItems.question: Do I need a home charger to own an EV?
faqItems.answer: A dedicated wallbox is recommended for daily convenience, but many drivers rely on public AC points or workplace charging.

faqItems.question: How long does the registration process take?
faqItems.answer: Dealers featured on Makina Elektrike handle homologation and registration, usually within two to four working days.

faqItems.question: Can I test drive before committing?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Each verified dealer page includes contact details to book EV test drives across Tirana, Durrës, Shkodër and beyond.

modelsPage.insightsSubtitle: Key considerations when comparing electric vehicles side by side.

insights.title: Battery capacity vs. usage
insights.description: City drivers often do well with 50–60 kWh packs, while frequent highway travellers should target 70 kWh or more.

insights.title: Charging curve
insights.description: Look beyond peak kW—steady charging curves reduce downtime on road trips even if the headline figure is moderate.

insights.title: Software & updates
insights.description: Ask whether the vehicle supports over-the-air updates and connected services that improve efficiency over time.

modelsPage.faqSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions from first-time EV buyers.

faqItems.question: What is WLTP and why does it matter?
faqItems.answer: WLTP is the European efficiency cycle. It provides a realistic estimate of range so you can compare models on equal terms.

faqItems.question: Can I filter only by rapid-charging capability?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Use the filters to focus on 100 kW+ DC charging or manually review the charging specifications on each model page.

faqItems.question: Are plug-in hybrids included?
faqItems.answer: Where available, we include PHEVs with meaningful electric range so you can evaluate them alongside full battery-electric models.

modelDetails.metaDescription: View detailed data for {{brand}} {{model}} — WLTP range {{range}} km, battery {{battery}} kWh and charging performance.
modelDetails.faqSubtitle: Good to know before requesting a quote or test drive.

faqItems.question: How does cold weather affect the range?
faqItems.answer: Expect a temporary reduction of 10–15% during Albanian winters. Preconditioning and eco driving help maintain range.

faqItems.question: Is the battery covered by warranty?
faqItems.answer: Most manufacturers offer 8-year / 160,000 km coverage, guaranteeing the battery remains above 70% capacity.

faqItems.question: What home charging do I need?
faqItems.answer: A 7.4 kW wallbox on a dedicated circuit is ideal; models supporting 11 kW three-phase charging reduce top-up times further.

aboutPage.title: About Makina Elektrike
aboutPage.metaTitle: About Makina Elektrike | EV directory for Albania
aboutPage.metaDescription: Learn how Makina Elektrike connects Albanian drivers with electric vehicles, dealerships and trusted advice.
aboutPage.p1: Makina Elektrike is the premier online directory for electric and hybrid vehicles in Albania. Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of sustainable transportation by providing a comprehensive, user-friendly platform for prospective buyers.
aboutPage.p2: We connect you with a wide network of official dealerships and importers, offering detailed information on the latest EV models available in the country. From technical specifications to dealership locations, we aim to be your one-stop resource for everything electric.
aboutPage.p3: Whether you're a seasoned EV enthusiast or just starting to explore your options, Makina Elektrike is here to guide you on your journey towards a cleaner, greener future on the road.
aboutPage.p4: Our team monitors market developments, charging infrastructure and policy updates so Albanian consumers and businesses can make informed decisions at every step.

pillars.title: Transparency
pillars.description: We prioritise verified data, clear pricing context and unbiased comparisons for all vehicles and dealers.

pillars.title: Local expertise
pillars.description: Guides and resources are written with Albanian roads, energy costs and regulations in mind.

pillars.title: Continuous innovation
pillars.description: We iterate quickly, adding new tools—from comparison charts to lead tracking—to support the EV ecosystem.

aboutPage.faqSubtitle: More context about our platform and how we work with partners.
